nodes.text: The 2-MAL personal comlink was a comlink model manufactured by Crozo Industrial Products. A cheap and simple, yet efficient, communications device, it was commonly used by the soldiers of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Jyn Erso notably carried one at the time of Operation Fracture.

The Crozo 2-MAL comlink first appeared in the 2016 movie Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. It is similar in name to the 3-MAL personal comlink, which was created for Bill Smith's 1997 reference book The Essential Guide to Weapons and Technology.
